snippet: The wristband will now come with a warning that it contains nickel, a common allergen used in many types of products, and a new sizing guideline to prevent users from wearing the devices too tightly.
abstract: Fitbit says another version of its wearable devices will not suffer same fate as its activity-tracking wristbands, which were recalled; wristbands will now come with warning that they contain nickel, common allergen, and new sizing guideline to prevent users from wearing devices too tightly.
lead_paragraph: The wristband will now come with a warning that it contains nickel, a common allergen used in many types of products, and a new sizing guideline to prevent users from wearing the devices too tightly.

headline.main: Fitbit Says It Will Make Changes to Address Complaints About Allergic Reactions
